text: قُل لَّوْ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٌ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذًا لَّٱبْتَغَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ سَبِيلًا

translation.en.sahih: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Jikalau ada tuhan-tuhan di samping-Nya, sebagaimana yang mereka katakan, niscaya tuhan-tuhan itu mencari jalan kepada Tuhan yang mempunyai 'Arsy".
